raw_body: DE ALWIS – FELICIA FORTUNE (nee’ KODAGODA) – 87 years. Dearly beloved wife of Wardy (Howard),​ loving mother of Rohan and mother-in-law of Aruni,​ cherished grandmother of Asantha & Gehan,​ daughter of late Don Elias Kodagoda (Proctor SC & NP and District Judge and the first Chairman of the then Bandarawela Urban Council),​ and the late Sita Kodagoda (nee’ Ganegoda),​ loving sister of late Gordon Kodagoda,​ late Lorraine (Bunty) Kasturiarachchi,​ late Geofrey Kodagoda,​ late Ivor Kodagoda,​ late Cherry Dunusinghe,​ Fritz Kodagoda,​ late Shirley Kodagoda Karunanayake,​ late Gwendoline Munasinghe. Her remains will lie at A.F. Raymond Funeral Parlour from 8.00 a.m. on Monday 24th July until 2.30 p.m. Cremation will take place at 3.00 p.m. at General Cemetery Borella.045465
